list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor `MessageContent` and `Message` into a new module.
Extracted `MessageContent`, `Message`, and related logic from `domain.models.conversation` into a dedicated `domain.models.messages` module to improve code organization and resolve circular dependency.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Add core architecture, tool registry, and specialized agents
Introduced the foundational structure for Luna, including core modules, adapters, domain models, and agents. Added specialized tools for cognition and reflection, system prompts for various agent tasks, and implemented Anthropic API integration for agent communication. This lays the groundwork for Luna's agent-based functionality.

Refactor hub initialization and improve conversation handling.
Added service dependencies to LunaHub for cleaner architecture and expanded the conversation handling logic to manage user-specific interactions. Simplified memory and user message processing, and updated the main function to reflect these changes. This improves modularity and readiness for further feature enhancements.

Refactor `AgentType` to a standalone `enums` module.
Moved `AgentType` from `agent.py` to a new `enums.py` to resolve circular import error.

Refactor `MessageContent` and `Message` into a new module.
Extracted `MessageContent`, `Message`, and related logic from `domain.models.conversation` into a dedicated `domain.models.messages` module to improve code organization and resolve circular dependency.

MESSAGE.value:

Introduced the foundational structure for Luna, including core modules, adapters, domain models, and agents. Added specialized tools for cognition and reflection, system prompts for various agent tasks, and implemented Anthropic API integration for agent communication. This lays the groundwork for Luna's agent-based functionality.

Refactor hub initialization and improve conversation handling.
Added service dependencies to LunaHub for cleaner architecture and expanded the conversation handling logic to manage user-specific interactions. Simplified memory and user message processing, and updated the main function to reflect these changes. This improves modularity and readiness for further feature enhancements.

Refactor `AgentType` to a standalone `enums` module.
Moved `AgentType` from `agent.py` to a new `enums.py` to resolve circular import error.

Refactor `MessageContent` and `Message` into a new module.
